it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet

Class BabelSynsetID

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma1.lcl.kb.ResourceID
      • it.uniroma1.lcl.kb.SynsetID
        • it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet.BabelSynsetID

  • public class BabelSynsetID
extends SynsetID
    Constructs a resource identifier with the specified BabelSynset ID. To obtain the corresponding synset, call toSynset().

    Usage example:

    ResourceID rID = new BabelSynsetID("bn:03083790n");
    Author:
    navigli
